variable.name: SUBJ_ID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject ID

variable.name: protocol
variable.description: Protocol - Study name

variable.name: base_vnum
variable.description: Visit number used for Baseline visit in SHARP. In many studies the first visit was the Baseline visit. In other studies there were up to five visits before the Baseline visit.

variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Affection status

variable.name: case_control_peak
variable.description: Affection status in PEAK
variable.comment: PEAK has less strict affection status criteria.

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of participant

variable.name: age_baseline
variable.description: Age at Baseline

variable.name: age_onset
variable.description: Age at first asthma symptoms

variable.name: htcm_baseline
variable.description: Baseline standing height

variable.name: WTKG_baseline
variable.description: Baseline weight

variable.name: bmi_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMI

variable.name: bmiz_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMIZ

variable.name: tx_grp
variable.description: Treatment group as assigned at Baseline. The following is a map between the CAMP treatment group and this tx_grp: Budesonide: formerly a value of 1 is tx_grp=4; Nedocrimil: formerly a value of 2 is tx_grp=8; Placebo: formerly a value of 3 is tx_grp=9

variable.name: saba_tx
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was SABA (Short acting B-agonist) arm

variable.name: laba_tx
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was LABA (Long acting B-agonist) arm

variable.name: cs_tx
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at Baseline was steroid arm

variable.name: cs_comb_tx
variable.description: Participant assigned to Combination Therapy Group (Steroid Treatment + other)

variable.name: cs_dose
variable.description: Corticosteroid dose

variable.name: clinic_city
variable.description: City of the clinic. The following is the map of CAMP clinics to CAMP clinic_city: if clinic=5 then clinic_city=8; if clinic=6 then clinic_city=10; if clinic=7 then clinic_city=11; if clinic=8 then clinic_city=12; else clinic_city=clinic
variable.comment: Note that the city may be the same, but clinics between CAMP, CARE, and ACRN studies are different and may have measurements that vary slightly. In order to distinguish between the CAMP, ACRN, and CARE data include the variable protocol along with clinic. Protocol is the project.

variable.name: smoke
variable.description: Participant smoked during trial

variable.name: ENV_SMOKE
variable.description: Either parent smoked during trial

variable.name: ENV_SMOKE_pretrial
variable.description: Home exposure to smoke prior to trial enrollment

variable.name: IUS
variable.description: In utero smoke: mother smoked when pregnant with participant

variable.name: tot_pred_bursts
variable.description: Total prednisone bursts during trial

variable.name: pred_bursts_event1_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to first prednisone burst. With the exception of a visit at 2 months, vists are four months apart. At each visit a participant answers whether prednisone was used since the previous visit. If prednisone had been used, the value of this variable is the number of months that the visit is from Baseline. For example, if the first burst was used between the four month and the eight month visit, the pred_bursts_event1_month variable has a value of eight assigned.
variable.comment: If there were no prednisone bursts for a subject, then the month represents the month that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event1_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to first prednisone burst. See description of pred_bursts_event1_month variable. The same assignment is done using months and then weeks are calculated from the months.
variable.comment: If there were no prednisone bursts for a subject, then the week represents the week that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event2_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to second prednisone burst. See description of pre_bursts_event1_month variable. The assignment is done in the same manner using the second prednisone bursts.
variable.comment: If there was not a second prednisone burst for a subject, then the month represents the month that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: pred_bursts_event2_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to second prednisone burst. The assignment is done in the same manner as pred_bursts_event1_week for the second prednisone burst.
variable.comment: If there was not a second prednisone burst for a subject, then the week represents the week that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: tot_edhos
variable.description: Total ER visit or hospitalization during CAMP from Baseline to month 48

variable.name: edhos_event1_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to first ER visit or hospitalization. See month assignments in pred_bursts_event1_month.
variable.comment: If there were no ER/hospitalizations for a subject, then the month represents the month that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: edhos_event1_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to first ER visit or hospitalization. See week assignments in pred_bursts_event1_week.
variable.comment: If there were no ER/hospitalizations for a subject, then the week represents the week that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: edhos_event2_month
variable.description: Number of months from Baseline to second ER visit or hospitalization. See month assignments in pred_bursts_event1_month.
variable.comment: If there was not a second ER/hospitalization for a subject, then the month represents the month that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: edhos_event2_week
variable.description: Number of weeks from Baseline to second ER visit or hospitalization. See week assignments in pred_bursts_event1_week.
variable.comment: If there was not a second ER/hospitalization for a subject, then the week represents the week that the subject was terminated from the study whether at the end of the study or on early withdrawal. In these cases, tot_edhos has a value of zero.

variable.name: prech_long
variable.description: Long term change in Pre-FEV1 between Baseline and a year after Baseline. The calculation is: 100*(Month12 PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV.

variable.name: prech_short
variable.description: Short term change in Pre-FEV1 between Baseline and two months after Baseline. The calculation is: 100*(Month2 PREFEV - Baseline PREFEV)/Baseline PREFEV.

variable.name: eno_baseline
variable.description: Baseline exhaled nitric oxide

variable.name: PC20_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1 PC20 methacholine

variable.name: LNPC20_baseline
variable.description: Natural log PC20 at Baseline
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the PC20 value.

variable.name: PREFEV_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1

variable.name: PREFVC_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FVC

variable.name: PREFF_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1/FVC ratio

variable.name: PREFEVPP_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FEV1 percent predicted

variable.name: PREFVCPP_baseline
variable.description: Baseline FVC percent predicted

variable.name: bdrabpct_baseline
variable.description: Baseline bronchodilator percent change. The calculation is: (POSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: ATOPY
variable.description: Child had atopic dermatitus for 2 yrs and was seen by a doctor for it.

variable.name: eos_baseline
variable.description: Baseline blood eosinophils

variable.name: log10eos_baseline
variable.description: Baseline log10 blood eosinophils
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the EOS value.

variable.name: IGE_baseline
variable.description: Baseline total IgE

variable.name: LOG10IGE_baseline
variable.description: Baseline log10 IgE
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the IgE value.

variable.name: ampf_baseline
variable.description: Average Baseline AM peak flow (L/min) as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Visits are in most cases four months apart.

variable.name: totres_baseline
variable.description: Baseline total rescue use per day

variable.name: amsym_baseline
variable.description: Average Baseline AM symptoms as recorded in daily diary card data between visits. Visits are in most cases four months apart.

variable.name: POS_SKINTEST_baseline
variable.description: One or more skintest positive at Baseline

variable.name: NALL_SKINTEST_baseline
variable.description: Number of skin tests (all tests) at Baseline

variable.name: NPOS_SKINTEST_baseline
variable.description: Number of positive skin tests (all tests) at Baseline
